product_name: GoLite TraveLite Carry-on Wheeled Luggage - 14" - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Got an overnight jaunt or quick business trip? The GoLite TraveLite 14" Carry-on Wheeled Luggage is small enough to fit under your seat, yet large enough to carry a laptop and clothes. Backpack fabric is strong yet lightweight. Built-in padded sleeve holds a 17-in. laptop. Oversize, smooth-rolling wheels with reinforced axles. Internal divider panels separate clothes from work materials. Double-bushing telescoping aluminum handle with ergonomic pull. Hidden, expandable water-bottle pocket. Front zip pocket gives you quick access to items you need in transit. GoLite TraveLite Carry-on Wheeled Luggage 14-in. has a padded grab handle. This item meets US carry-on size restrictions as well as typical international carry-on standards. Closeout.
short_description: Got an overnight jaunt or quick business trip? The GoLite TraveLite 14" Carry-on Wheeled Luggage is small enough to fit under your seat, yet large enough to carry a laptop and clothes.
